title: Clinvigilant
description: Offering a comprehensive suite of eClinical solutions, this company specializes in advanced Clinical Trial Management Systems (CTMS) to streamline complex trial processes and enhance efficiency in patient engagement, regulatory compliance, and data management.

title: Ennov
description: Facilitating end-to-end management of clinical trials, this software uniquely integrates clinical data management, regulatory documentation, and pharmacovigilance for seamless workflow efficiency across the life sciences industry.
